question: Which of the following committee gave recommendations on separation of Policy-making, Regulation & Operations in Indian Railways and setting up of a Railway Regulatory Authority of India (RRAI)?
explanation:
Recommendations of the Bibek Debroy Committee include:
1. Establishment of Independent Regulator RRAI
2. Transition to commercial accounting
3. Streamline recruitment & HR processes
4. Focus on core areas
5. Decentralisation
6. Indian Railway Manufacturing Company
7. Encouraging private entry
